title: Coronavirus: Fake and misleading stories that went viral this week
subtitle: A global look at Covid-19 rumours and disinformation.
author: www.bbc.com
vclaim:
Was Brooklyn rapping along to The Notorious B.I.G.?

Your mate's tip-off about steam? Ignore it

Irene Ken did not approve this message

We have seen rumors about #COVID19 circulating on social media that cite a Johns Hopkins immunologist and infectious disease expert. We do not know the origin of these rumors.

 

Get credible information from Johns Hopkins University and Medicine experts: https://t.co/8yP58VAR0N — Johns Hopkins University (@JohnsHopkins) March 28, 2020 The BBC is not responsible for the content of external sites. View original tweet on Twitter
